title: The funeralles of King Edward the sixt VVherin are declared the causers and causes of his death.
author: Baldwin, William, ca. 1518-1563?
publisher: In Fletestrete nere to saynct Dunstons church by Thomas Marshe,
notes: By William Baldwin, whose name appears in the heading of "To the reader".
Running title reads: The funeralles of King Edvvard the syxt.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
